page.title: 11HOME LIFE:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: My name is Joanne and I have got 3 sisters and 1 brother and only one of my sisters lives in my{house.}Her name is Karen and she works in an Electrical Shop.My Dad works at an Icecream factory and he is a Chargehand.My Mum does not go out to work.She works in the house.She does all the washing and other things that need doing.My {hobbies}are playing football,badminton,swimming or any other sport like running.On Monday I get up and go to {school}at nine o'clock.Then we stay at school till quarter past three.On a Monday morning my Mum cleans the house and she sometimes goes to see my Nan.She lives across the road from us.My sister and Dad go to work. My Dad goes about half past six in the morning and my sister goes about twenty past eight.After school I play with Emma,my friend.
